Original: You must be explorers, newly arrived.
Would you like to partake in a few
drinks and... Oh, but I am mistaken.
[Page]
Many apologies, but I am allowed only
to parcel out work to explorers
approved by the Outland Count.
[Page]
Make sure that you come back to me
after you have finished the initiation
mission issued at the Grand Court.
Translation: You must be explorers, newly arrived.
Would you like to partake in a few
drinks and... Oh, but I am mistaken.
[Page]
Many apologies, but I am allowed only
to parcel out work to explorers
approved by the Outland Count.
[Page]
Make sure that you come back to me
after you have finished the initiation
mission issued at the Grand Court.

Original: You have completed the mission. My
congratulations to you. Now I may
extend to you a few opportunities.
[Page]
Here at the Dancing Peacock, you may
accept [Color:5]quests[Color:0] and seek [Color:5]information[Color:0]
from our patrons.
[Page]
Completion of these quests is met with
commensurate [Color:5]rewards[Color:0]. Many explorers
enjoy passing time in this way.
[Page]
A request I think to be perfect for
you was only just posted. Might I ask
that you look it over?
Translation: You have completed the mission. My
congratulations to you. Now I may
extend to you a few opportunities.
[Page]
Here at the Dancing Peacock, you may
accept [Color:5]quests[Color:0] and seek [Color:5]information[Color:0]
from our patrons.
[Page]
Completion of these quests is met with
commensurate [Color:5]rewards[Color:0]. Many explorers
enjoy passing time in this way.
[Page]
A request I think to be perfect for
you was only just posted. Might I ask
that you look it over?

Original: And you must be the explorers, newly
arrived and confirmed by the Grand
Court. My congratulations.
[Page]
Here at the Dancing Peacock, you may
accept [Color:5]quests[Color:0] and seek [Color:5]information[Color:0]
from our patrons.
[Page]
Completion of these quests is met with
commensurate [Color:5]rewards[Color:0]. Many explorers
enjoy passing time in this way.
[Page]
A request I think to be perfect for
you was only just posted. Might I ask
that you look it over?
Translation: And you must be the explorers, newly
arrived and confirmed by the Grand
Court. My congratulations.
[Page]
Here at the Dancing Peacock, you may
accept [Color:5]quests[Color:0] and seek [Color:5]information[Color:0]
from our patrons.
[Page]
Completion of these quests is met with
commensurate [Color:5]rewards[Color:0]. Many explorers
enjoy passing time in this way.
[Page]
A request I think to be perfect for
you was only just posted. Might I ask
that you look it over?

Original: So then, you have given yourself the
name of [Guild]? I cannot parcel out
work to guilds not yet confirmed.
[Page]
But it may be good to ask the other
patrons the basics of exploration.
Those who gather here are skilled.
[Page]
Well then, [Guild] Guild. I shall
pray for safety in your travels.
Kismet be with you.
Translation: So then, you have given yourself the
name of [Guild]? I cannot parcel out
work to guilds not yet confirmed.
[Page]
But it may be good to ask the other
patrons the basics of exploration.
Those who gather here are skilled.
[Page]
Well then, [Guild] Guild. I shall
pray for safety in your travels.
Kismet be with you.

Original: The requests will mount up over time.
Be sure to check the notice board
every so often.
[Page]
Now, shall we start over? Welcome to
the Dancing Peacock. I hope we will
be fast friends, [Guild] Guild.
Translation: The requests will mount up over time.
Be sure to check the notice board
every so often.
[Page]
Now, shall we start over? Welcome to
the Dancing Peacock. I hope we will
be fast friends, [Guild] Guild.

Original: Ah, yes. If you report on a request
that you have not indeed completed,
it will be considered cancelled.
[Page]
You must take responsibility for the
requests that you accept. The best
explorers do not disappoint clients.
Translation: Ah, yes. If you report on a request
that you have not indeed completed,
it will be considered cancelled.
[Page]
You must take responsibility for the
requests that you accept. The best
explorers do not disappoint clients.

Original: Ah. You are making your way in the
Lush Woodlands, no? How do you fare
in the Windy Plains' largest maze?
[Page]
If you have come to a standstill,
might I advise taking on some quests?
An unexpected breakthrough may occur.
[Page]
If your destination is a smaller cave,
consider taking work centered on that
area before you go.
Translation: Ah. You are making your way in the
Lush Woodlands, no? How do you fare
in the Windy Plains' largest maze?
[Page]
If you have come to a standstill,
might I advise taking on some quests?
An unexpected breakthrough may occur.
[Page]
If your destination is a smaller cave,
consider taking work centered on that
area before you go.

Original: So then, your [Guild] Guild has
undertaken to slay the red bear too.
[Page]
I know that this is the quick path to
gaining renown, but do not be so hasty
on this path that you fall off.
[Page]
Many patrons of this establishment
will never be seen again after
chasing this red bear.
[Page]
I try to stay detached from individual
explorers, but I still feel the ache
of their loss.
Translation: So then, your [Guild] Guild has
undertaken to slay the red bear too.
[Page]
I know that this is the quick path to
gaining renown, but do not be so hasty
on this path that you fall off.
[Page]
Many patrons of this establishment
will never be seen again after
chasing this red bear.
[Page]
I try to stay detached from individual
explorers, but I still feel the ache
of their loss.

Original: Ah, [Guild]. It seems your journey
is progressing smoothly. We are all
happy to see such spirited explorers.
[Page]
You have scarcely arrived but have
already succeeded in going beyond
the northern barrier.
[Page]
See how our patrons are excited to
hear your stories! Why not while away
the hours with them?
Translation: Ah, [Guild]. It seems your journey
is progressing smoothly. We are all
happy to see such spirited explorers.
[Page]
You have scarcely arrived but have
already succeeded in going beyond
the northern barrier.
[Page]
See how our patrons are excited to
hear your stories! Why not while away
the hours with them?

Original: Welcome. You of the [Guild] Guild
are becoming regulars here.
[Page]
It took you time to find your feet,
but now you are famous adventurers who
regularly explore uncharted territory.
[Page]
I have become a devotee of your
adventures myself. You will never be
turned away at my establishment.
Translation: Welcome. You of the [Guild] Guild
are becoming regulars here.
[Page]
It took you time to find your feet,
but now you are famous adventurers who
regularly explore uncharted territory.
[Page]
I have become a devotee of your
adventures myself. You will never be
turned away at my establishment.

Original: Ah, the [Guild] Guild. Are you here
for requests today or for a small
meal?
[Page]
I understand that your own journey
takes priority, but do not neglect to
check the request board.
[Page]
The explorers of Tharsis have a duty
to the people as well. Many of us
are depending on you, after all.
Translation: Ah, the [Guild] Guild. Are you here
for requests today or for a small
meal?
[Page]
I understand that your own journey
takes priority, but do not neglect to
check the request board.
[Page]
The explorers of Tharsis have a duty
to the people as well. Many of us
are depending on you, after all.

Original: I have heard you will work with these
Vessel people to rescue a girl. What?
How do I know this?
[Page]
Haha, is that a question? I am the
owner of the largest clearinghouse of
explorers in Tharsis. I know all.
[Page]
Dalla's menu, a certain guild's bloody
love triangle, where the carpenter's
boy hides his poetry...
Translation: I have heard you will work with these
Vessel people to rescue a girl. What?
How do I know this?
[Page]
Haha, is that a question? I am the
owner of the largest clearinghouse of
explorers in Tharsis. I know all.
[Page]
Dalla's menu, a certain guild's bloody
love triangle, where the carpenter's
boy hides his poetry...

Original: Ah, the [Guild] Guild. You have my
congratulations on your successful
rescue of the girl.
[Page]
Though I am surprised. Not only did
you return, but you brought a Vessel
here with you.
[Page]
There were already so many colorful
individuals here, and now things will
be even more interesting.
Translation: Ah, the [Guild] Guild. You have my
congratulations on your successful
rescue of the girl.
[Page]
Though I am surprised. Not only did
you return, but you brought a Vessel
here with you.
[Page]
There were already so many colorful
individuals here, and now things will
be even more interesting.

Original: Welcome, [Guild] Guild. Is all in
the new land going as you hoped?
[Page]
I have met many explorers tending
this bar, but you are the first to
come so far, so quickly.
[Page]
You may yet be the ones who finally
reach Yggdrasil. Such is my hope...
Kismet be with you.
Translation: Welcome, [Guild] Guild. Is all in
the new land going as you hoped?
[Page]
I have met many explorers tending
this bar, but you are the first to
come so far, so quickly.
[Page]
You may yet be the ones who finally
reach Yggdrasil. Such is my hope...
Kismet be with you.

Original: These foolish explorers and their
voyages to the Sacred Mountains...
I believe they have given me a cold.
[Page]
A noble wants to eat ice. An artist
wants to sculpt it. Someone wishes to
show ice to their dying grandfather.
[Page]
The requests keep coming in, and the
ice comes in with it... Please excuse
me, I believe I am about to sneeze...!
Translation: These foolish explorers and their
voyages to the Sacred Mountains...
I believe they have given me a cold.
[Page]
A noble wants to eat ice. An artist
wants to sculpt it. Someone wishes to
show ice to their dying grandfather.
[Page]
The requests keep coming in, and the
ice comes in with it... Please excuse
me, I believe I am about to sneeze...!

Original: Ah, the [Guild] Guild... Welcome.
What is it that brings you to my
establishment on this day?
[Page]
Mm... another guild I knew is lost.
Do not misunderstand! They are all
still in good health.
[Page]
But they doubted their skill as
explorers and decided to disband.
[Page]
Not every guild's end is bloody...
But I hope that you do not share their
unfortunate fate, [Guild] Guild.
Translation: Ah, the [Guild] Guild... Welcome.
What is it that brings you to my
establishment on this day?
[Page]
Mm... another guild I knew is lost.
Do not misunderstand! They are all
still in good health.
[Page]
But they doubted their skill as
explorers and decided to disband.
[Page]
Not every guild's end is bloody...
But I hope that you do not share their
unfortunate fate, [Guild] Guild.

Original: The Sentinels have such bulky builds.
[Page]
They keep hitting their heads against
the lintel. Perhaps I should consider
remodeling with them in mind...
[Page]
Our human clientele has increased as
well. They want to rub shoulders with
a certain famous guild...
Translation: The Sentinels have such bulky builds.
[Page]
They keep hitting their heads against
the lintel. Perhaps I should consider
remodeling with them in mind...
[Page]
Our human clientele has increased as
well. They want to rub shoulders with
a certain famous guild...

Original: It came as a shock to learn that man
was from the Empire. Though thinking
upon it, I never knew his real name.
[Page]
Though, as an explorer, he was not
strictly taking sides, so much as--
Half a moment here!
[Page]
He still has outstanding requests to
fulfill! Harrumph! What shall I say
to his clients?
[Page]
He must not get away with this.
Please, [Guild] Guild. Do what you
must to catch him... for my sake.
Translation: It came as a shock to learn that man
was from the Empire. Though thinking
upon it, I never knew his real name.
[Page]
Though, as an explorer, he was not
strictly taking sides, so much as--
Half a moment here!
[Page]
He still has outstanding requests to
fulfill! Harrumph! What shall I say
to his clients?
[Page]
He must not get away with this.
Please, [Guild] Guild. Do what you
must to catch him... for my sake.

Original: Is your journey progressing smoothly?
I have seen only a few veteran guilds
come and go from that labyrinth.
[Page]
And even men of such skill bow out,
one after another, due to the deadly
traps there.
[Page]
You must let nothing break you. Not
the labyrinth, not the monsters...
and most of all, not yourselves.
Translation: Is your journey progressing smoothly?
I have seen only a few veteran guilds
come and go from that labyrinth.
[Page]
And even men of such skill bow out,
one after another, due to the deadly
traps there.
[Page]
You must let nothing break you. Not
the labyrinth, not the monsters...
and most of all, not yourselves.

Original: The city has been in a tizzy. You see
more soldiers around Tharsis now...
Everyone is so stern and frightened.
[Page]
You seem busy yourselves. I hope that
you are getting the proper rest.
[Page]
I know you feel that everything is in
crisis and must be dealt with swiftly.
But that is the time to act carefully.
Translation: The city has been in a tizzy. You see
more soldiers around Tharsis now...
Everyone is so stern and frightened.
[Page]
You seem busy yourselves. I hope that
you are getting the proper rest.
[Page]
I know you feel that everything is in
crisis and must be dealt with swiftly.
But that is the time to act carefully.

Original: As if the Vessels and the Sentinels
were not enough, now we must deal
with something called an Empire.
[Page]
With all that has happened since your
arrival, I thought nothing could
perturb me anymore.
[Page]
And yet... What in heaven's name is
happening? To see Yggdrasil withered
like this...
Translation: As if the Vessels and the Sentinels
were not enough, now we must deal
with something called an Empire.
[Page]
With all that has happened since your
arrival, I thought nothing could
perturb me anymore.
[Page]
And yet... What in heaven's name is
happening? To see Yggdrasil withered
like this...

Original: I don't like this not being able to
see Yggdrasil from here.
[Page]
The tree was a constant presence in
all of our lives. But now I know it
had taken root in this city...
[Page]
Be truthful, [Guild] Guild. Has
Yggdrasil truly been lost to us...?
What a sad thought.
Translation: I don't like this not being able to
see Yggdrasil from here.
[Page]
The tree was a constant presence in
all of our lives. But now I know it
had taken root in this city...
[Page]
Be truthful, [Guild] Guild. Has
Yggdrasil truly been lost to us...?
What a sad thought.

Original: It shocked me to my core to see
Yggdrasil withered, but I cannot stay
upset while running my bar.
[Page]
This establishment is where those who
are distraught by this turn of events
come to find solace, after all.
[Page]
If you ever feel the need to talk,
feel free to visit, and I will lend
a welcoming ear.
Translation: It shocked me to my core to see
Yggdrasil withered, but I cannot stay
upset while running my bar.
[Page]
This establishment is where those who
are distraught by this turn of events
come to find solace, after all.
[Page]
If you ever feel the need to talk,
feel free to visit, and I will lend
a welcoming ear.

Original: The Outland Count has decided to take
in the Imperial people. A few of them
were just here introducing themselves.
[Page]
They are all so earnest... It is
a sign of how deep the troubles of
their homeland run.
[Page]
But Tharsis has so many happy-go-lucky
people, not least of which is the
Count himself. Are we a good fit...?
Translation: The Outland Count has decided to take
in the Imperial people. A few of them
were just here introducing themselves.
[Page]
They are all so earnest... It is
a sign of how deep the troubles of
their homeland run.
[Page]
But Tharsis has so many happy-go-lucky
people, not least of which is the
Count himself. Are we a good fit...?

Original: The time has come, [Guild] Guild.
You are going out to do battle with
that thing, aren't you?
[Page]
All a mere bar owner can do is to
say "Thank you, and come again," to
explorers as they depart...
[Page]
But I say those words in order that
I might say "Welcome back" upon your
return.
[Page]
So thank you, and come again. No...
That is not enough this time.
[Page]
May you swiftly return to us.
Translation: The time has come, [Guild] Guild.
You are going out to do battle with
that thing, aren't you?
[Page]
All a mere bar owner can do is to
say "Thank you, and come again," to
explorers as they depart...
[Page]
But I say those words in order that
I might say "Welcome back" upon your
return.
[Page]
So thank you, and come again. No...
That is not enough this time.
[Page]
May you swiftly return to us.

Original: Ah, you are back! You seem remarkably
unchanged for one who has defeated a
Titan. If I did not know better...
[Page]
I would say you had just completed
an ordinary request. Perhaps your
reward for it is a city at ease?
[Page]
Very fitting. Welcome back, you of
the [Guild] Guild. And thank you
for returning Yggdrasil to us.
Translation: Ah, you are back! You seem remarkably
unchanged for one who has defeated a
Titan. If I did not know better...
[Page]
I would say you had just completed
an ordinary request. Perhaps your
reward for it is a city at ease?
[Page]
Very fitting. Welcome back, you of
the [Guild] Guild. And thank you
for returning Yggdrasil to us.

Original: Your accomplishment is amazing, make
no mistake, but... Hrmmm...
[Page]
I am simply saying that you do not
give the sense that you are heroes.
[Page]
Then again, compared to the flawless
paragons of virtue in those boringly
epic songs and sagas...
[Page]
I think I prefer the unrefined
adventurers in the stories told
by tipplers.
Translation: Your accomplishment is amazing, make
no mistake, but... Hrmmm...
[Page]
I am simply saying that you do not
give the sense that you are heroes.
[Page]
Then again, compared to the flawless
paragons of virtue in those boringly
epic songs and sagas...
[Page]
I think I prefer the unrefined
adventurers in the stories told
by tipplers.

Original: A great wind is blowing today, as
usual... This is how Tharsis ought
to be.
[Page]
Tell me, then. Now that you have
conquered Yggdrasil, what is the next
item on your agenda?
[Page]
Because whenever a difficult request
is posted... I can think of no one
to handle it but you.
[Page]
Make sure you do not let any go unmet.
I cannot allow you to leave Tharsis
with unfinished business.
Translation: A great wind is blowing today, as
usual... This is how Tharsis ought
to be.
[Page]
Tell me, then. Now that you have
conquered Yggdrasil, what is the next
item on your agenda?
[Page]
Because whenever a difficult request
is posted... I can think of no one
to handle it but you.
[Page]
Make sure you do not let any go unmet.
I cannot allow you to leave Tharsis
with unfinished business.

Original: The Empire's immigrants seem to be
settling in smoothly. I wonder what
this will mean for our city...
[Page]
Ah, but before we speak of that,
I have heard that you found another
labyrinth to venture into.
[Page]
You never rest, do you? Tell me,
[Guild] Guild. Why is it that you
find labyrinths so fascinating?
Translation: The Empire's immigrants seem to be
settling in smoothly. I wonder what
this will mean for our city...
[Page]
Ah, but before we speak of that,
I have heard that you found another
labyrinth to venture into.
[Page]
You never rest, do you? Tell me,
[Guild] Guild. Why is it that you
find labyrinths so fascinating?

Original: The Yggdrasil you brought back to us
can be seen once again from the city.
It is, as ever, quite beautiful.
[Page]
Indulge my curiosity... Do you have
any idea where your next adventure
may carry you?
[Page]
If not, perhaps you could stay a
while and... But perhaps not.
[Page]
But wherever you go, do not forget
the city with the beautiful view of
Yggdrasil... and the people there.
[Page]
I... will not be sad to see you go.
My work involves waiting for you
explorers to return, after all.
[Page]
That is why you should head out with
heads held high. And...
[Page]
May you swiftly return to us!
Translation: The Yggdrasil you brought back to us
can be seen once again from the city.
It is, as ever, quite beautiful.
[Page]
Indulge my curiosity... Do you have
any idea where your next adventure
may carry you?
[Page]
If not, perhaps you could stay a
while and... But perhaps not.
[Page]
But wherever you go, do not forget
the city with the beautiful view of
Yggdrasil... and the people there.
[Page]
I... will not be sad to see you go.
My work involves waiting for you
explorers to return, after all.
[Page]
That is why you should head out with
heads held high. And...
[Page]
May you swiftly return to us!

Original: [Color:5]How will you respond?[Color:0]
"Because we're explorers."
"Because they're there."
"For the fame and fortune."
"We're not telling."
Translation: [Color:5]How will you respond?[Color:0]
"Because we're explorers."
"Because they're there."
"For the fame and fortune."
"We're not telling."

Original: Ah, of course. I was foolish to ask
an explorer such a question.
[Page]
At least your answer was simple and
straightforward enough.
Translation: Ah, of course. I was foolish to ask
an explorer such a question.
[Page]
At least your answer was simple and
straightforward enough.

Original: Harrumph! Will death be the only cure
for your adventure-addled brains?
[Page]
And if it were, are there any caves
or monsters left that could bring
about your demise?
[Page]
But it's the addling of your brains
that makes you so endearing. In which
case, stay addled as long as you can.
Translation: Harrumph! Will death be the only cure
for your adventure-addled brains?
[Page]
And if it were, are there any caves
or monsters left that could bring
about your demise?
[Page]
But it's the addling of your brains
that makes you so endearing. In which
case, stay addled as long as you can.

Original: I can certainly understand that.
To work hard for one's own desires
is a trustworthy motivation.
[Page]
But if you should happen to gain
this fame and fortune you seek, might
I ask that you share some with me?
Translation: I can certainly understand that.
To work hard for one's own desires
is a trustworthy motivation.
[Page]
But if you should happen to gain
this fame and fortune you seek, might
I ask that you share some with me?

Original: But why not!? Harrumph...
Translation: But why not!? Harrumph...
